    Consulting

    IP Portfolio

    Logiblock applies its IP portfolio to accelerate your product development.

    • Embedded wireless IP networking, BLE and device-to-device mesh networking design.
    • Extremely high reliability firmware design for safety-of-life applications.
    • Experts in bulletproof firmware update design, including over-the-air (OTA) updates.
    • Ultra-low-power (~10ÂµA wireless) hardware and software engineering.

    About

    Logiblock is the client services division of Outbreak, Inc. Founded as a technology research and development group in 2008, Outbreak primarily develops and licenses embedded software technology.
